thread.title: Cleveland Public Theatre's "Barbecue" is a ferociously funny send-up of addiction, Hollywood and race (review)
thread.title_full: Cleveland Public Theatre's "Barbecue" is a ferociously funny send-up of addiction, Hollywood and race (review)

author: Andrea Simakis, The Plain Dealer
title: Cleveland Public Theatre's "Barbecue" is a ferociously funny send-up of addiction, Hollywood and race (review)
text: With "Barbecue," playwright Robert O'Hara cements himself as one of the most potent, sophisticated and fearless satirists writing today.
